overview: A shady enterprise known only as The Company, run by a mysterious Employer, is in the business of training assassins-for-hire. When Mason Reinhart’s target exposes him to the dark truth behind The Company’s history, he sets out on a mission to discover his true identity. After The Employer assigns a contract for Mason’s death, elite assassin Sable is expected to collect a large pay day, but crossing paths with Mason will expose them both to a past they aren’t supposed to remember.
title: Kill Code 87
